name: HD Porn Style LoRA [1MB]
description:
A Style-LoRA for re-creating that bright, crisp and sometimes vibrant look of high quality Porn productions.

If you feel like supporting my work, please consider visiting my Patreon to get access to more detailed instructions on how to get the most out of my models and have a say in what's up next: Link.

What it does:

It generally makes your image a bit brighter, adds some contrast and increases/adds depth of field. Also saturation is increased considerably, especially when you use 'colorful' in your prompt.

Although it was made for usage with pornographic imagery, it can help you make pretty much any scene pop.

You can use it at any strength you want, it will just change the intensity of the effect. I'd recommend 0.6 as a starting point

All preview image comparisons use the same prompt+seed, with and with out the LoRA active.

It currently changes faces quite a bit (for the better IMO), but that's something I'm looking to get rid of in the next version.

Amateur version here: Amateur Porn Style LoRA

Based on UberRealisticPornMerge

If you like this, you may also like my other LoRAs.
